scripts.dev: cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli --program ./dist/playground/example-1.js --inspect 0.0.0.0:9229
scripts.list: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli list
scripts.connect: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli connect
scripts.logout: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli logout
scripts.login: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli login
scripts.scaffold: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli scaffold
scripts.create: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli create
scripts.info: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli info
scripts.help: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli --help
scripts.update: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli update --program ./dist/playground/example-1.js
scripts.update_host: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && node ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli update --host=https://www.google.com --program ./dist/playground/example-1.js
scripts.dev-local: cd ../pumble-cli && rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../playground && PUMBLE_API_URL=http://localhost:8080 PUMBLE_FILEUPLOAD_URL=http://localhost:8888 ../pumble-cli/bin/pumble-cli --program ./dist/playground/example-1.js --inspect 0.0.0.0:9231
